data.title: Prague Rugby Tours
data.meta_description: Prague Rugby tours, we can arrange all, Hotels, coach transfers, games and much more, all is very easy to book using our company
data.text:
The Prague rugby tours to the Czech capital have increased greatly over the years. The Czech Republic has progressed leaps and bounds since the 1989 Velvet Revolution. Now there are more than 18 registered Rugby Union Clubs and 4 Rugby League Clubs. We can arrange everything for successful Prague Rugby tours, including help with flights. Also booking of Accommodation / Transfers / games and a great selection of after game Entertainment.

We have compiled some Prague rugby tours ideas to help you put together your own tour. These are not set in stone, you can change them about as you like (we cannot arrange flights). You make your own tour within our individual offers. And we can accommodate either Rugby Union or Rugby League playing sides.

Rugby Tour to Prague (option A) includes :

2 nights Hostel (breakfast included)

Private Airport Coach Transfers

Rugby match with beer and food.

Coach transfers,

Free beer tickets,

Info Party Map.

Price on request – just fill in the BOOKING ENQUIRY FORM below. Or send an EMAIL and we will send you back all details as soon as possible.

Rugby Tour to Prague (option B) includes :

2 nights Hotel (with breakfast)

Private Airport Coach Transfers

Rugby match with beer and food.

Coach transfers

Free beer tickets.

Info Party Map.

Price on request – just fill in the BOOKING ENQUIRY FORM below. Or send an EMAIL and we will send you back all details as soon as possible.

Rugby Tour to Prague (option C) includes :

3 nights Hostel

Private Airport Coach Transfers

2 x Rugby matches with beer and food.

Coach transfers.

Free beer tickets.

Info Party Map.

Price on request – just fill in the BOOKING ENQUIRY FORM below. Or send an EMAIL and we will send you back all details as soon as possible.

Rugby Tour to Prague (option D) includes :

3 nights Hotel

Private Airport Coach Transfers

2 x Rugby matches with beer and food

Coach transfers.

Free beer tickets.

Info Party Map.

Price on request – just fill in the BOOKING ENQUIRY FORM below. Or send an EMAIL and we will send you back all details as soon as possible.
